common.confirmDeletePrompt: Are you sure you want to delete this prompt?

common.visiblePromptInfo: Prompt text is visible to students
common.fileInfoPrompt: Here is the contents of the file

info.title: ## Attention
info.disclaimer:
CurreChat is a generative AI tool developed at the University of Helsinki. The service is managed by the Educational Technology Services (OTE). CurreChat has been developed especially for teaching purposes. For more general use it's recommended to use the the university licensed generative AI service [Microsoft 365 Copilot](https://helpdesk.it.helsinki.fi/en/help/20071). 
 
 **Access to the service and use in courses** — University of Helsinki staff have access to the general user interface of the service. Students can use CurreChat in courses where the service has been activated. As a teacher, you can find your courses and activate them via the "Courses I teach" button. 
 
 **Usage limits** — The use of advanced language models is limited to a certain number of tokens. For general use, the counter is reset monthly. In courses, students have a certain number of tokens available for the entire course. Teachers have the option to raise the token limit for their course and reset students' token counters. 
 
 To reduce token consumption, reset the conversation when you change the topic. _Note that use of the lighter language models (4o-mini and 4.1-mini) does not decrease yout token counter._ 
 
 **Data security and user responsibilities** — CurreChat uses large language models developed by OpenAI, which are hosted on Microsoft Azure cloud services within the EU. Materials entered into the service are not used for training language models, and conversations are not stored in the system. 
 
 CurreChat complies with the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). _However, confidential or secret information must not be processed in CurreChat._ The user must ensure that they have sufficient rights to process the materials they enter into the service. 
 
 **Instructions and further information** 
 
 - [Artificial intelligence in teaching](https://teaching.helsinki.fi/instructions/node/3923) (Instructions for teaching) 
 - [Using AI to support learning](https://studies.helsinki.fi/instructions/node/3968) (The Studies Service) 
 - [Generative AI at the university](https://helpdesk.it.helsinki.fi/en/help/20064) (IT HelpDesk) 
 - [General principles for the use of generative artificial intelligence](https://flamma.helsinki.fi/s/4GSqe) (Flamma) 
 - For questions about CurreChat, you can contact [educationaltechnology@helsinki.fi](mailto:educationaltechnology@helsinki.fi)

chat.start: Start the conversation by sending a message...
chat.systemMessageInfo: Initialize the conversation by giving high level instructions to the AI
chat.exampleSystemMessage: e.g. You are a helpful assistant
chat.toBeSaved: The discussion will be saved anonymously
chat.testUseInfo: The new chat view is still in development and bugs are likely to occur

settings.promptInstructions: The prompt refers to general guidelines for the conversation. For example, the language model can be asked to use academic language or to act as a gardener being interviewed about cactus care.
settings.temperatureInstructions: Higher values, like 0.8, make the output more random, while lower values, like 0.2, make it more accurate and deterministic.
settings.confirmDeletePrompt: Are you sure you want to delete the prompt '{{name}}'?

status.limitedUsage: , the other models are not usable when the limit is reached

error.noAccessInfo: You do not currently have access to CurreChat
error.streamCreationTimeout: Creating the stream timed out, retrying

course.isReseachCourse: The course is a research course
course.canOptOut: It is noit possible to opt out from saving the discussions

course.curreEnabled: CurreChat is enabled for the course
course.curreNotEnabled: CurreChat is not enabled for the course
course.curreNotOpen: Students cannot access the chat of this course
course.curreOpen: The course chat is open for students
course.curreWasOpen: The course chat has been closed
course.curreWillBeOpen: The course chat will be open for students
course.enableCurreModalText: The course will by default use {{defaultModel}} and have a token usage limit of {{defaultTokenLimit}} per student. CurreChat will be available between {{activityPeriod}} (course running time + 1 month). You can edit these settings later.
course.closeToMaxTokenLimit: Students close to the token limit
course.usagePercentage: Percentage of students who have used CurreChat:
course.oneMandatoryPrompt: Course can have only one mandatory prompt
course.isSavedOptOut: The course discussions will be saved anonymously if you give permission to save
course.isSavedNotOptOut:
The course discussions will be saved anonymously

Saved discussions can be used for research purposes
course.isSavedForTeacherOptOut: The course discussions will be saved anonymously if user gives permission to save. Saved discussions can be used for research purposes
course.directPromptLink: Link to chat with this prompt active
course.copyDirectPromptLinkInfo: Copy a link to chat with this prompt active
